abstract: drive for act extension mapped by traders
snippet: Stirred by the setbacks to the Allies in Europe, the nation moved swiftly last week to strengthen its defenses....

headline.main: PROBLEMS OF DEFENDING HEMISPHERE ARE MANY; Bases for Aircraft and Fleets Are First Consideration in Mapping a New System of Protection

lead_paragraph: Stirred by the setbacks to the Allies in Europe, the nation moved swiftly last week to strengthen its defenses.
